msg: - removed announcement directory as the announcements were not up to date and anyway we can generate the same report automatically with the announcement plugin

author: michal
msg: war:clean was depeneding on war:init which was changed and call to test:test goal was added there. This removes this problem. Change was dissussed @mailing list. I will duble check all my applications and usecases  but i think it's OK like this.
